title: Tremors 4 - The Legend Begins (Michael Gross)
description:
TREMORS 4 - THE LEGEND BEGINS - 2004

  The small town of Rejection (later to be renamed Perfection) is starting to boom as the local silver mine is very productive. But the mining disturbs something in the ground and the miners begin to disappear. Most of the town flees except a small handful. The mine's owner arrives, Mr. Gummer (again played by Michael Gross). This Gummer is different than his descendant in that he does not even own a gun.
  Well, Gummer and the remaining residents set out to check the mine over and then get rid of the "dirt dragons" via a skilled gunslinger. In the end everyone must pull together to end the menace.

  Starring: Michael Gross, Sara Botsford, Billy Drago, Brent Roam, August Schellenberg.

  Directed by: S.S. Wilson.

  Quality: Very Good Xvid from DVD.

  Length: 1hr. 41min.

  Language: English.

  Size: 688 x 432
